Currency.description: Payment and transaction currency as applicable on the selected Investment type

MinInvestmentRequirement.description: Minimum investment required for opening the investment account in XYZD

HandlingFees/Supplementary.description: Account handling fees applicable for products in XYZD excluding taxes per annum

AnnualFees.description: Recurring fees and charges payable periodically in XYZD excluding of taxes

InvestmentTenure.description: Duration of investment period in months

DepositRate.description: Interest rate applicable for deposits only

HistoricInvestmentRate.description: This covers the historic rates that are gained by the investors in the selected fund
